Room.Name: Crow's Nest Entry
Room.ShortDescription: You are just under the crow's nest, looking at the trapdoor entry.
Room.LongDescription: Below you is a dizzying distance to the ship's deck, and from here it looks so small that if you fell, you might not even hit it, but would probably take a dive into the surrounding waters. There is a tangle of lines and sails just below your feet. The small sway that you hardly noticed when you were below is greatly magnified from this height. It seems to be making you sick. Wouldn't it be terrible to erp on your friends below?
